sentences.english: So take advantage of the moonless skies in the evenings this week, and go stargazing.

sentences.english: The night air was as cold as water in the dim and quiet village with brilliant stars in the sky overhead.

sentences.english: Family men still live under the stars, staying close to their animals.

sentences.english: According to my father, the chart of my sky curiously resembles a pentagram .

sentences.english: For I am water by nature, and inhabit in wetland and starry sky.
